title: Sri Sivani College of Engineering: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Sri Sivani College of Engineering Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Sri Sivani College of Engineering Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Sri Sivani College of Engineering Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

SSCE, Srikakulam Courses
description: The Undergraduate courses offered by the Sri Sivani College of Engineering are a B.Tech course in 4 different specializations, the M.Tech course in 5 specializations, a Diploma in 3 specializations, and an MBA course in 3 specializations. Apart from this institute also provides an MCA course. Following are the details for the same.

basic_info.name: Sri Sivani College of Engineering Placement
description: Training, Placement, and Career Guidance Cell of Sri Sivani College of Engineering continuously coordinates with various industries and organizations for the placement of the students. It works on developing the industry-academic inter-relationship with the corporate sectors for the training of students. Cell functions on planning the full-fledged training program for the students to project the capability of the students’ skills to fulfill the requirements of the corporate world. For that training, the cell arranges Seminars / Workshops on Career opportunities, interactive sessions between alumni and students, mock interview practices, etc.

basic_info.name: Sri Sivani College of Engineering Faculty
description: All the faculty members at Sri Sivani College of Engineering are well experienced in their respective fields of study. There are 10 faculty members out of which 5 faculty members are Ph.D. holders. Every department named Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering, Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Department of Mechanical Engineering, Department of MBA has 2 faculty members.

basic_info.name: Sri Sivani College of Engineering FAQS

faqs.question: Does SSCE Srikakulam have a hostel accommodation facility?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. SSCE provides a separate hostel facility for the girls and boys students.

faqs.question: How is the library of SSCE Srikakulam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Library of SSCE has 28,768 volumes of books, 4676 Titles, 816 Journal Back Volumes, 1112 CDs. A library's collection can include books and periodicals, encyclopedias, newspapers, prints, documents, CDs, DVDs, ebooks, NPTEL videos, Data books, etc.

faqs.question: Ques, Does SSCE Srikakulam arrange Industrial Visits for their students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. To give better exposure to the students about the working of industries and corporates, SSCE arranges Industrial Visits.

faqs.question: What is the intake capacity of the students for the courses at SSCE Srikakulam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Intake according to the specializations:CoursesSpecializationIntake SeatsDiplomaEngineering60B.TechMechanical Engineering120Electronics & Communications Engineering120Computer Science Engineering120Civil Engineering60M.TechComputer Science And Engineering18Digital Electronics & Communication Systems18Power Electronics18VLSI Design18Software Engineering18MBABusiness Administration60MCAComputer Applications60

faqs.question: How to apply for the courses at SSCE Srikakulam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Register your name with one of the administrative offices along with a copy of the intermediate marks for B.Tech.; degree marks for M.Tech / MBA for admission.

Section.name: About SSCE
Section.description:
Sri Sivani College of Engineering [SSCE] is a technical institution of Andhra Pradesh established in 2006 under the Sri Sivani Group of colleges. Institute is approved by AICTE and is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University [JNTU]. SSCE Srikakulam offers various UG, PG, and Diploma level courses in the field of engineering and management.
The college works to bridge the gap by imparting the required skills to students of engineering so that they can have better opportunities in employment and or education. Training for the placement to the students is provided by the training department as well as the external agencies like Orion Edutech, Talent Sprint, Smart, India Times, Gate Forum, etc. to meet the requirements of corporates. College often conducts campus recruitments by inviting renowned companies.
Check: Sri Sivani College Admission
Table of Content
The Undergraduate courses offered by the Sri Sivani College of Engineering are a B.Tech course in 4 different specializations, the M.Tech course in 5 specializations, a Diploma in 3 specializations, and an MBA course in 3 specializations. Apart from this institute also provides an MCA course. Following are the details for the same.

Training, Placement, and Career Guidance Cell of Sri Sivani College of Engineering continuously coordinates with various industries and organizations for the placement of the students. It works on developing the industry-academic inter-relationship with the corporate sectors for the training of students. Cell functions on planning the full-fledged training program for the students to project the capability of the students’ skills to fulfill the requirements of the corporate world. For that training, the cell arranges Seminars / Workshops on Career opportunities, interactive sessions between alumni and students, mock interview practices, etc.

Ques. Does SSCE Srikakulam have a hostel accommodation facility?
Ans. Yes. SSCE provides a separate hostel facility for the girls and boys students.
Ques. How is the library of SSCE Srikakulam?
Ans. Library of SSCE has 28,768 volumes of books, 4676 Titles, 816 Journal Back Volumes, 1112 CDs. A library's collection can include books and periodicals, encyclopedias, newspapers, prints, documents, CDs, DVDs, ebooks, NPTEL videos, Data books, etc.
Ques, Does SSCE Srikakulam arrange Industrial Visits for their students?
Ans. Yes. To give better exposure to the students about the working of industries and corporates, SSCE arranges Industrial Visits.

Ans. Intake according to the specializations:
Ques. How to apply for the courses at SSCE Srikakulam?
Ans. Register your name with one of the administrative offices along with a copy of the intermediate marks for B.Tech.; degree marks for M.Tech / MBA for admission.
